missible. Where people place themselves on this continuum does not de-
pend on any simple acceptance of one argument over another, but instead
on the weight they give certain factors. To what extent does a fetus have
rights? The pro-life position we examined earlier grants the fetus a full (or
close to full) right to life. The pro-choice position usually grants few or no
rights to the fetus. In what areas do questions of welfare override certain in-
dividual rights? The conservative in
